item.description:
Welcome to the October Downtown Boston Maltese meetup group! I hope to see you all this month.

If you cannot make it this month, don't forget about Divas Unelashed annual Halloween Pet Parade to benefit Canine Comapnions for Independence, led by the Salem High School Marching Band, Randy Price from Channel 7 News and your Grande Diva!

www.doggieday.com/halloween for more info and how to register.



Best,

Rob
item.name: The Downtown Boston Maltese Meetup November Meetup
